    ğŸ“Œmy solution

    def solution(my_string, index_list):
    new = []
    for i in index_list:
        new.append(my_string[i])
    return ''.join(new)

    ğŸ’•other solution

    def solution(my_string, index_list):
    return ''.join(my_string[idx] for idx in index_list)
